title: Nicole’s Amazing Website <3 :)
text:
All About Me! 
I am in my fourth year at the University of Waterloo and when I Graduate, I would like to pursue further education for a master’s in Developmental Psychology and Education.
I am currently volunteering at Pivot Point in Milton, where I assist behaviour analysts in supporting adults with diverse abilities.
My Interests
As of right now, I don’t have research experience but I am making an effort to change that! (if you are interested in having a research assistant, please see my cv below).
The discipline of psychology that I am most interested is developmental psychology. I have loved working with children since I was a child, and the more I engage with children now, the more I realize the importance of researching and understanding development.
To Get in Contact with Me If you are interested in having either a volunteer or a research assistant, please reach out to me at any of the contacts I have listed below.
Phone number: (905) 462-1332. 
Email: nhua@uwaterloo.ca
Linkedin: Nicole Hua
